verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> upon <WH5921> Jonath-elem-rechokim, <WH3128> Michtam <WH4387> of David, <WH1732> when the Philistines <WH6430> took <WH270> him in Gath. <WH1661> Be merciful <WH2603> unto me, O God: <WH430> for <WH3588> man <WH582> would swallow me up; <WH7602> he fighting <WH3898> daily <WH3605> <WH3117> oppresseth <WH3905> me.
Mine enemies <WH8324> would daily <WH3605> <WH3117> swallow me up: <WH7602> for <WH3588> they be many <WH7227> that fight <WH3898> against me, O thou most High. <WH4791>
What time <WH3117> I am afraid, <WH3372> I <WH589> will trust <WH982> in <WH413> thee.
In God <WH430> I will praise <WH1984> his word, <WH1697> in God <WH430> I have put my trust; <WH982> I will not <WH3808> fear <WH3372> what <WH4100> flesh <WH1320> can do <WH6213> unto me.
Every <WH3605> day <WH3117> they wrest <WH6087> my words: <WH1697> all <WH3605> their thoughts <WH4284> are against <WH5921> me for evil. <WH7451>
They gather themselves together, <WH1481> they hide <WH6845> themselves, they <WH1992> mark <WH8104> my steps, <WH6119> when <WH834> they wait for <WH6960> my soul. <WH5315>
Shall they <WH3926> escape <WH6403> by <WH5921> iniquity? <WH205> in thine anger <WH639> cast down <WH3381> the people, <WH5971> O God. <WH430>
Thou tellest <WH5608> my wanderings: <WH5112> put <WH7760> thou <WH859> my tears <WH1832> into thy bottle: <WH4997> are they not <WH3808> in thy book? <WH5612>
When <WH3117> I cry <WH7121> unto thee, then <WH227> shall mine enemies <WH341> turn <WH7725> back: <WH268> this <WH2088> I know; <WH3045> for <WH3588> God <WH430> is for me.
In God <WH430> will I praise <WH1984> his word: <WH1697> in the LORD <WH3068> will I praise <WH1984> his word. <WH1697>
In God <WH430> have I put my trust: <WH982> I will not <WH3808> be afraid <WH3372> what <WH4100> man <WH120> can do <WH6213> unto me.
Thy vows <WH5088> are upon <WH5921> me, O God: <WH430> I will render <WH7999> praises <WH8426> unto thee.

For <WH3588> thou hast delivered <WH5337> my soul <WH5315> from death: <WH4480> <WH4194> wilt not <WH3808> thou deliver my feet <WH7272> from falling, <WH4480> <WH1762> that I may walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> God <WH430> in the light <WH216> of the living. <WH2416>
